name: Brutal Doom: Project Brutality
description: Project Brutality is back and it is bigger, better, and more badass than ever before. This is the highest quality expansion of content for Brutal Doom v20b that capitalizes on breaking new ground in terms of gameplay, features, weapons, enemies, balance, visuals, sound, and so much more. Now with Zandronum 3.0 support, multiplayer is a feature.
